item.title: How to build a virtualization solution?
item.description: This is a huge topic, but I will apply here the phrase divide and conquer. I will explain the main components of these solutions one by one, the topics around each one and the technologies that can be used. Remember that I’m not an expert on this topic, just a curious guy, and I can make mistakes. If so, leave me a comment please!, I will be happy to talk with you about this and exchange some opinions.

item.title: Manage libvirt with Python, TLS and SASL
item.description: If you don’t know what the libvirt is, then the official web page can clarify some things: The libvirt project is a toolkit to manage virtualization platforms. It is used by many applications and support multiple hypervisors like KVM, QEMU, Xen, VMWare and others. In this post I will show you how to interact with libvirt using Python and the KVM hypervisor, but first things first. What do you need to start?
